forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins its gentle descent over Downtown San Francisco, the vibrant blue sky spreads like a canvas, unmarred by the heavy fog that often cloaks the city. The air is crisp yet invigorating, kissed by a gentle breeze fluttering at around 21 mph, whispering promises of a serene afternoon. The temperature, nudging just above 60, invites a refreshing sense of warmth, with only a hint of chill reminding us of the coastal air. As evening approaches, the clouds will roll in softly, brushing against the skyline, but not before leaving behind shades of gold and soft pastel hues at dusk.

For those contemplating an evening outing, the conditions suggest a delightful stroll along the Embarcadero or a casual visit to one of the many quaint cafés nestled in the heart of the city. Dress in layers; a light jacket will serve well against the cool breeze, while comfortable footwear ensures readiness for spontaneous adventures across beautifully lit streets. The gentle sway of the evening will lull the senses, making it a fine backdrop for quiet reflection or shared laughter with friends. In this fleeting moment of clarity, the city wears its best attire, unraveling just enough to reveal its charm beneath the fading light.
